name: safetech_apex_automation
description: Projeto de automação e2e de aplicação oracle apex, projeto POC

scripts.test: npx playwright test && allure generate allure-results -o allure-report --clean && allure open allure-report
scripts.test:headed: npx playwright test --headed && allure generate allure-results -o allure-report --clean && allure open allure-report
